original: Server HV-VR1078\n\nCurrent Project: Photon Laser Rifle
translation: 服务器HV-VR1078\n\n当前项目：光子激光步枪
武器开发计划进一步说明

original: Elder McNamara has requested a weapons development program be started here in Hidden Valley, given the current situation. He has drawn up three design briefs, one for a durable, high power, high accuracy weapon to increase the capabilities of our Scout teams in long range engagements, one for a similarly durable mid to close range, rapid fire weapon for close quarters combat, and one CQB powerhouse blaster to fill in the gaps in the engagement distances of our old AER9 and Tri-Beam models. They have served us well, but they are noticeably lacking in fire rate for CQB, and their long range stopping power is proving inadequate in too many situations. Compounding this is the fact that the AER Rifles we are using at the moment are too old and unreliable for the amount of reliance we are placing on them; damn things keep breaking down halfway through scouting missions.
translation: 麦克纳马拉长老鉴于当前形势，要求在隐秘山谷启动武器研发计划。他已经起草了三份设计概要，一份是为提升我们侦察队在远程交战中的能力，设计的耐用、高功率、高精度的武器；一份是同样耐用的中至近程快速射击武器，用于近战；还有一份是CQB强力武器，用于填补我们老旧的AER9和三光束武器在交战距离上的空白。这些旧武器虽然曾立下汗马功劳，但在CQB中的射速明显不足，而且在太多情况下远程制动力也不够用。更糟糕的是，我们目前使用的AER步枪太过老旧且不可靠，根本无法承受我们对它们的依赖；这些该死的东西总是在侦察任务中途就出现故障。

original: Development of the new high-power laser weaponry is going very well, especially given the current lack of resources at our disposal. Knight Lorenzo's solution to the problem we were having with the high energy requirement for the weapons was elegant to say the least. Switching the energy source to energy cells and adding magazines stopped the scouts from complaining about having to reload the weapons with microfusion cells constantly. Having to rechamber the rifle every shot can be a pain, but it will help with ammo reservation and might help cool down some of those hot head, trigger happy brothers in the field. On the other hand, a conventional open bolt system powered by electromagnetic fields caused by the discharging of the Energy Cells was used for the rechambering of cells in the PDW. This reduced the power output and accuracy of the weapon to an extent, but the increase in RPM was worth it to say the least. Lastly, the tube magazine ripped from a conventional Riot Shotgun holds Energy Cells perfectly, and the reliability of the pump action will be of great sevice in the field.
translation: 新型大功率激光武器的发展非常顺利，特别是考虑到我们目前可用的资源有限。骑士洛伦佐提出的解决武器高能量需求的方案，至少可以说很巧妙。将能源切换到能源电池并添加弹匣，可以防止侦察兵抱怨不得不经常为武器更换微型聚变电池。每次射击后重新装填步枪确实是个麻烦，但这样有助于节省弹药，也有助于给战场上那些头脑发热、容易冲动的兄弟们降降温。另一方面，PDW的重新装填则采用了由能量电池放电产生的电磁场驱动的常规开膛待击系统。这在一定程度上降低了武器的输出功率和准确性，但转速的提高至少是值得的。最后，从常规霰弹枪上拆下的管状弹匣非常适合存放能源电池，泵动式操作的可靠性将在战场上发挥巨大作用。

original: Some modifications have been made for the new rifle, sets of extended magazines have been made for longer missions, as well as an improved straight pull bolt for faster rechambering. These modifications haven't made it onto the latest prototypes yet, but they are ready to go for test firing as soon as Hardin gives us a time slot in the firing range. Similar Extended Mags have been manufactured for the PDW, as well as attachable Laser Pointer and Red Dot Sights for both the PDW and the Shotgun. All in all, these modifications should greatly improve the viability of the new weapons.\n\nTorres has requested a few of the new weapons to be stocked in the store so some of the Brothers can test them out themselves in leu of the distribution of the weapons on patrol. Eager to get her hands on some new toys I'd say... Once we have the manufacturing process streamlined the weapons can be distributed throughout the Bunker, but until then we will be relying on the old AER 9's.
translation: 新步枪已经进行了一些改进，包括为执行更长时间任务而制作的扩容弹匣，以及改进后的直拉式枪栓，以实现更快的重新装填。这些改进尚未应用于最新的原型枪上，但一旦哈丁在射击场为我们安排时间，它们就可以进行试射了。同时，我们也为PDW制造了类似的扩容弹匣，以及可为PDW和霰弹枪安装的激光指示器和红点瞄准镜。总的来说，这些改进应该会大大提高新武器的实用性。\n\n托雷斯要求我们在商店里储备一些新武器，这样兄弟会的成员就可以在巡逻时自己试用这些武器，而不是直接分发给他们。我想说，她很想尝试这些新玩意儿……一旦我们的制造流程简化，这些武器就可以在掩体内广泛分发，但在此之前，我们还将依赖旧的AER 9。

original: All Photon Laser Weapons have been added to the Laser Commander Perk List and the nessesary Form & Leveled Lists.
translation: 所有的光子激光武器都已经被添加到激光指挥官特权列表以及必要的表格和分级列表中了。
光子激光武器激光瞄准器

original: Decreases spread, adds laser sight effect.
translation: 减少扩散，增加激光瞄准效果

original: Photon Laser Weapon Red Dot Sight
translation: 光子激光武器红点瞄准器
光子激光步枪定制枪机
光子激光步枪扩容弹匣
